ra.util

Class CaughtExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ra.util.CaughtExceptionHandler

  • public class CaughtExceptionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    It is used to observe the log of calling Exception.printStackTrace() in the process.
